March 4, 2025 - Barq's (/ˈbɑːrks/) is a brand of root beer created by Edward Barq and bottled since the beginning of the 20th century. It is owned by the Coca-Cola Company. It was known as "Barq's Famous Olde Tyme Root Beer" until 2012.

t: Amazon.com : Barq's Root Beer 12oz Can 12 Pack : Soda Soft Drinks : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Barq's remains one of the few (only?) national root beers with caffeine. For me, that's a plus. It is on the sweeter side, with a vanilla emphasis. It goes back to the 1890s, and it one of the true original root beer drinks. As hot day drinks go, this can hit the spot.
